mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inquiries (inqry_id, inqry_type_cd, inqry_trgt_type_cd, wrtr_id, inqry_store_id, inqry_ttl, inqry_cn, prvt_yn, prcs_stts, prcs_user_no, mdfcn_ymd, del_dt, del_user_no, del_actvtn_yn) VALUES (#{inqryId}, #{inqryTypeCd}, #{inqryTrgtTypeCd}, #{wrtrId}, #{inqryStoreId}, #{inqryTtl}, #{inqryCn}, #{prvtYn}, #{prcsStts}, #{prcsUserNo}, #{mdfcnYmd}, #{delDt}, #{delUserNo}, #{delActvtnYn})
mapper.select: SELECT i.inqry_id, i.inqry_type_cd, i.inqry_trgt_type_cd, i.wrtr_id, i.inqry_store_id, i.inqry_ttl, i.inqry_cn, i.prvt_yn, i.prcs_stts, i.prcs_user_no, i.reg_ymd, i.mdfcn_ymd, i.del_dt, i.del_user_no, i.del_actvtn_yn, u.user_no, u.mbr_grd_cd, u.user_lgn_id, u.user_nm, u.user_pswd_encpt_val, u.gender_se_cd, u.eml_addr, u.telno, u.user_brdt, u.zip_cd, u.addr, u.daddr, u.user_ncnm, u.user_status, u.join_dt, u.whdwl_dt, u.last_info_mdfcn_dt FROM inquiries i JOIN users u ON i.wrtr_id = u.user_no ORDER BY i.reg_ymd DESC

SELECT i.inqry_id, i.inqry_type_cd, i.inqry_trgt_type_cd, i.wrtr_id, i.inqry_store_id, i.inqry_ttl, i.inqry_cn, i.prvt_yn, i.prcs_stts, i.prcs_user_no, i.reg_ymd, i.mdfcn_ymd, i.del_dt, i.del_user_no, i.del_actvtn_yn, u.user_no, u.mbr_grd_cd, u.user_lgn_id, u.user_nm, u.user_pswd_encpt_val, u.gender_se_cd, u.eml_addr, u.telno, u.user_brdt, u.zip_cd, u.addr, u.daddr, u.user_ncnm, u.user_status, u.join_dt, u.whdwl_dt, u.last_info_mdfcn_dt FROM inquiries i JOIN users u ON i.wrtr_id = u.user_no WHERE i.inqry_id = #{inquiryId}

SELECT i.inqry_id, i.inqry_type_cd, i.inqry_trgt_type_cd, i.wrtr_id, i.inqry_store_id, i.inqry_ttl, i.inqry_cn, i.prvt_yn, i.prcs_stts, i.prcs_user_no, i.reg_ymd, i.mdfcn_ymd, i.del_dt, i.del_user_no, i.del_actvtn_yn, u.user_no, u.mbr_grd_cd, u.user_lgn_id, u.user_nm, u.user_pswd_encpt_val, u.gender_se_cd, u.eml_addr, u.telno, u.user_brdt, u.zip_cd, u.addr, u.daddr, u.user_ncnm, u.user_status, u.join_dt, u.whdwl_dt, u.last_info_mdfcn_dt FROM inquiries i JOIN users u ON i.wrtr_id = u.user_no WHERE i.inqry_id = #{inquiryId}
SELECT MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(inqry_id, 5) AS UNSIGNED)) AS maxId FROM inquiries WHERE inqry_id LIKE 'inq_%' AND SUBSTRING(inqry_id, 5) REGEXP '^[0-9]+$';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM inquiries WHERE prcs_stts != 'DELETED' and prcs_stts != 'HIDDEN'

SELECT i.inqry_id, i.inqry_type_cd, i.inqry_trgt_type_cd, i.wrtr_id, i.inqry_store_id, i.inqry_ttl, i.inqry_cn, i.prvt_yn, i.prcs_stts, i.prcs_user_no, i.reg_ymd, i.mdfcn_ymd, i.del_dt, i.del_user_no, i.del_actvtn_yn, u.user_no, u.user_ncnm, u.user_status /* 필요 없는 user 컬럼들은 성능을 위해 제거하는 것이 좋습니다. 여기서는 user_ncnm과 user_status 정도만 가져오도록 축약했습니다. 모든 user 컬럼이 필요하다면 원래대로 두셔도 됩니다. */ FROM inquiries i JOIN users u ON i.wrtr_id = u.user_no WHERE i.prcs_stts != 'DELETED' and i.prcs_stts != 'HIDDEN' ORDER BY i.reg_ymd DESC, i.inqry_id DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{startRow}
SELECT ans_id, inqry_id, answr_user_no, ans_cn, ans_tm, answr_type_cd, rls_yn, last_mdfcn_dt, actvtn_yn, del_dt, del_user_no FROM answer where inqry_id = #{inquiryId}
mapper.update: UPDATE inquiries SET prcs_stts = 'DELETED', del_dt = NOW(), del_user_no = #{deleteUserId} WHERE inqry_id = #{inquiryId}
